item.title: Need a videographer for a short project in Lucknow - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

I am looking for a skilled videographer based in Lucknow to film an unboxing reaction video. The videographer must have access to a professional camera, lighting equipment, and a high-quality microphone. The ideal candidate will have experience capturing authentic reactions and creating engaging videos.

Responsibilities:

Film an unboxing reaction video in a well-lit and visually appealing setting.
Capture clear audio of the subject's reactions and comments.
Deliver the video in a timely manner.

Requirements:
Owns a professional-grade camera, lighting equipment, and a high-quality microphone.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Please submit the following with your proposal:

A link to your portfolio or examples of your previous work.
A brief overview of your experience filming similar projects.
Your proposed rate for this project.
I look forward to hearing from talented videographers in Lucknow who can help me capture this special moment.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 06:14 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Camera
Skills: Videography, Camera
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Gym Training Montage - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, we are looking for someone to create a montage of workout clips liek deadlifting, snorting preworkout, posing and dry sacooping pre workout. we are a preworkout company so that is the focus but we are looking to post it on tik tok and instagram reels to bring attention to our brand. We are looking for time re mapping music syncing and flashy editing style. We will choose you based off of your previous work to see if it fits our style. It will be a gaming esk style edit of real world clips

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 26, 2024 06:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Gaming
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Gaming
Country: Australia

item.title: Need Anime recap video editor (Must be a Anime watcher) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a professional anime recap video editor who is an avid anime watcher and experience in understanding viewer retention.

Requirements:

Must be an anime watcher.
Proven work history with evidence of working with channels. Do not claim to have worked with big channels if you cannot provide proof.
Willingness to do a test due to the prevalence of stolen portfolios.
Expertise in keeping the audience engaged.
premier pro user

Compensation:

Starting pay: $12 for 20min [This will be monthly salary base project]

Application Instructions:

Include the word "recap" in your proposal; otherwise, it will not be viewed.
Terms:

If you do not agree with any of the given terms, please do not apply.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 06:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Anime, Manga
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Anime, Manga
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I want to record a series of marketing help videos which I already have planned out. Each one will be 2 to 3 minutes long, sometimes longer and sometimes possibly shorter.
I will supply the raw video of me talking to the camera about the subject matter and then I want it edited to something more engaging, with potential overlays, backgroups, copy and so on. I'm open to suggestions.
If you want to see previous videos I have done - check out my profile on @iamsimondell on TikTok
I want to be able to share these on TikTok, Reels and YouTube Shorts and YouTube full length so I need someone who can adapt the footage to suit.
I am looking to do one of these per week. I want someone who can do all the editing and post-production and then deliver the final videos within a 7-day time frame.

Do NOT contact me via any other medium other than Upwork.
Do NOT contact me unless you have an existing portfolio on TikTok, YouTube or another channel.
Do NOT send me Google Drive links

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 06:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Part-Time Video Editor for Marketing Agency - Upwork
item.description:
Hello freelancer - please read the following before applying!

We are looking to add 1 video editor to join our team and support our lead designer.
The position is part-time but will grow into full-time in the future.

_Who we are:_
Digital Time Savers is a Full Service Marketing Agency with Empathy

_Here are the skills & responsibilities that we’re looking for:_

- Expert in video editing for Social media, YouTube and Advertisements (Adobe Premiere, Canva)
- Color correction
- Audio cleanup

_Our perfect hire:_
If you are proactive but will check-in.
Who pays attention to details and double-checks their work.
Who is genuinely creative.
Who is honest and always up-front.
Who is looking to grow and is available long-term.
Then you are the perfect fit!

Knowledge about Facebook, Instagram, Google Ads, and YouTube graphics and thumbnails will be appreciated.

- Availability (Don't apply if you are too busy with other projects).

We offer:
- Great working environment
- Room for creativity
- Long-Term position
- Growth

You will be assigned a quick test to evaluate your skills and process.

Lastly, please remember that an NDA will need to be signed.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 05:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop, Video Production, Banner Ad Design, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop, Video Production, Banner Ad Design, Video Post-Editing
Country: Bulgaria
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for E-Commerce Products / Dropshipping - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Video Editor for E-Commerce Products

Job Summary

Create Facebook/IG video ads for our ecommerce products.

Responsibilities:

Create video of product assigned, using video clips from online clips and/or custom videos we provide.
Make sure the video follows the structure of the examples we have
Also make thumbnails for the videos

Requirements
Must be familiar with Facebook & Tiktok video ads
It’s an absolute must you be attentive to details and meticulous. The videos should be clean without errors or inconsistencies.  
English must be good enough to understand what copy to use and edit if need be.
Must know of AI tools for voiceovers (tell us what you use with samples you made)
Must be able to use camtasia so we can share source files and I can edit if need be

If this role is interesting to you, please reach out and express your interest. Please apply using the word “top” to show you've read the entire job post. You must also include sample videos you made from scratch.

Please also answer these questions:

Can you please share 3 examples of videos you made

Can you generate voiceover AI? What app do you use?

For 1 video with 3 different hooks (same video with first 3-5 seconds changed only). What would you charge?


Budget: $500
Posted On: June 26, 2024 05:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Ecommerce, Shopify Dropshipping, Dropshipping
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Ecommerce, Shopify Dropshipping, Dropshipping
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Company policy narratives animated videos - Upwork
item.description:
Dear Freelancers,

I am intending to narrate the company policy to employess through interactive animated videos with voice overs that will be both in english and swahili.

Our company policy has 17 chapters with different topics, am intending each video to cover one chapter and the video duration should not exceed 2 minutes.

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 26, 2024 05:31 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:2D Animation, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: 2D Animation, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
